last_episode_to_air.name: Melodic Mommas (Brandy & Melissa Etheridge)
last_episode_to_air.overview: Brandy's daughter Sy'Rai was born and raised on MTV. Melissa Etheridge's daughter Bailey dives deep into her musical childhood.

name: MTV's Family Legacy
overview: A brand new music series that looks back on the most celebrated moments of legendary artists -- from Diddy to *NSYNC -- through the eyes of their kids.
tagline: We call them Music Legends. They call them Mom or Dad.

episodes.name: Dads Who Rock (Linkin Park & Van Halen)
episodes.overview: Get ready to rock as Chester Bennington's son Draven watches Linkin Park's biggest MTV moments for the very first time. Andrew Hagar is joined by his dad Sammy to relive Van Halen's reign over the early days of MTV.

episodes.name: Boyband Babies (Backstreet Boys & *NSYNC)
episodes.overview: Baylee Littrell takes an emotional look back at the Backstreet Boys most iconic MTV moments. Briahna and her dad Joey Fatone dish out behind the scenes *NSYNC secrets.

episodes.name: Big Poppas (Notorious B.I.G. & Diddy)
episodes.overview: CJ Wallace sets the record straight about his notorious d.a.d, Biggie Smalls. Diddy's sons Quincy, King, and Justin react to some of their dad's biggest moments captured on MTV, AND a few of their own.

episodes.name: Harmonious Households (Boyz II Men & TLC)
episodes.overview: This episode brings the heart AND soul - Nathan Morris II harmonizes with vintage clips of his dad's early days in Boyz II Men. "Creep" down memory lane with Chilli from TLC's son Tron Austin.

episodes.name: Melodic Mommas (Brandy & Melissa Etheridge)
episodes.overview: Brandy's daughter Sy'Rai was born and raised on MTV. Melissa Etheridge's daughter Bailey dives deep into her musical childhood.
